headline: Prudential Launches FlexGuard 2.0 with New Investment Allocation Options to Help Customers Protect Their Life’s Work, Furthering Commitment to the Registered Index-Linked Annuity Space
summary: NEWARK, N.J., December 15, 2025--Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) today announced the launch of FlexGuard 2.0, the next evolution of the company’s flagship retail registered index-linked annuity (RILA) U.S. retirement product lineup.
